text: Victor Posa (born 5 November 1966 in Bari) is an Italian ice hockey player. He played 2 games for the Chicago Black Hawks of the NHL. ==Other websites== * Category:1966 births Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Sportspeople from Apulia Category:Living people Category:Ontario Hockey League players Category:Sportspeople from Bari Category:ECHL players Category:Colonial Hockey League players Category:Ice hockey defencemen
title: Victor Posa
